definition: to have no qualified successors to carry on one's undertaking
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: Folk Art is in a endangered state of no heir .
sentences.chinese: 民間美術處於後繼無人的瀕危狀態。

sentences.english: It is very worrying that there is no heir on the Chinese Womens Diving Team.
sentences.chinese: 中國女子跳水隊後繼無人的現象令人擔憂。
